channel.title: Error I don't know how to fix [667]

skype: thekidcaliber

item.title: Error I don't know how to fix [667]
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

First, your error seems to be because you placed the if statement within some other code.
Kinda like:

[code=java]
boolean a = true
if(a == true) {

};[/code]
^You will notice the ending semi-colon for the boolean a is at the end of the if statement. This would cause similar to your error.

Another thing I’m questioning is the logic of your code.
You have one boolean without parenthesis, suggesting it’s a variable on it’s own; but then you have the same one but with parens… Suggesting it’s a method that returns a boolean.

This could be a name-conflict. You should try to name variables uniquely and based off what they do.

Read full topic
item.source: Error I don't know how to fix [667]
